title: Country convulsed by protests begins vaccination campaign
description: For more than a year, Lebanon has been convulsed by sporadic mass protests and violence. The country was already careening toward financial and economic collapse before Covid-19 reared its head. CNN's Ben Wedeman reports.

title: Fareed's take: Biden's foreign policy plans are 'worrying'
description: CNN's Fareed Zakaria says there are worrying signs the Biden administration seems willing to tailor its foreign policy agenda to placate GOP critics and ultimately, it will not work.

title: How Brazil gambled on unproven drugs to fight Covid-19
description: Brazilian President Jair Bolsonaro has long been a champion of drugs chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine to cure Covid-19, despite multiple studies that show that they are not effective. Now, documents show that his government spent emergency funds on the medicines and continued to produce and distribute them at unprecedented rates throughout 2020 while rejecting at least one offer to purchase a vaccine already in the final stage of trials because the terms were "abusive."

title: Biden has no good options on Afghanistan with deadline for troop withdrawal looming
description: The Biden administration is just weeks away from having to make a decision whether to end the nearly 20-year military deployment in Afghanistan that has claimed nearly 2,400 American lives, as experts and US officials told CNN there are no good options available and the best hope is to avert "catastrophe."

title: Covid-19 cases have declined sharply. These factors will determine how pandemic unfolds from here
description: A grim new forecast confirms what experts caution amid declining Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations: when it comes to the pandemic, the US is not yet out of the woods.

title: Djokovic becomes second man ever to reach 300 grand slam wins
description: Novak Djokovic became just the second man in history to reach 300 grand slams wins with victory over Milos Raonic in the fourth round of the Australian Open.

title: UAE's Hope Probe Mars mission sends back its first picture of red planet
description: The United Arab Emirates' first Mars mission has returned its first picture of the red planet.

title: 'SNL' takes on Trump's impeachment acquittal
description: The Senate acquitted former President Donald Trump in his second impeachment trial Saturday, and "Saturday Night Live" made sure to lampoon the day's proceedings using their own Tucker Carlson.

title: Japan earthquake the latest in a long line of setbacks for beleaguered Tokyo Games
description: Less than six weeks before the Olympic torch relay was due to begin in Fukushima, showcasing the region's recovery from a catastrophic nuclear disaster a decade ago, the Japanese prefecture has once again been rocked by a powerful earthquake.

title: Volkswagen CEO: I'm not scared of Apple
description: Volkswagen's CEO Herbert Diess isn't intimidated by Apple, even though the tech company potentially has an electric car on the way.

title: Sorry, millennials. The emoji isn't cool anymore
description: Bad news for people who frequently use the 😂 emoji: It is no longer cool.

title: Bitcoin soars, nearing $50,000 for the first time
description: Bitcoin is this close to $50,000, continuing a stunning rise that has sent it soaring nearly $20,000 this year.

title: How the dark and sordid past of the Cecil Hotel inspired Netflix's latest crime show
description: Something you have on your 2021 bingo card? Netflix is adding another true-crime series to its ever-growing roster.

title: UK has administered 15 million first doses of Covid-19 vaccine
They love each other but Covid has torn them apart
description: When Riëtte Badenhorst got home from her cancer surgery in South Africa, all her fiancé Steve Mann could do was comfort her on the phone, all the way from the UK. Riëtte wishes he had been with her.

title: How Italy changed Stanley Tucci forever
description: Stanley Tucci wants to put you straight about Italy. A land where the sun shines, the nonnas smile and every plate of spaghetti bolognese comes showered in parmesan cheese? Scratch that.

title: How to rekindle the flame that the pandemic extinguished
description: Absence makes the heart grow fonder, but how can you miss your love if they never go away?

title: This Trump acquittal is different
description:
• Analysis: Decoding Trump's statement on his Senate acquittal
• This is Trump's heaping list of legal problems post-impeachment
• Opinion: This was no triumph for Trump

title: The EU is facing its most serious crises in history -- but is anyone really in charge?
description: The year is only six weeks old, but 2021 is already revealing the European Union's inherent limitations.

title: White House deputy press secretary resigns after threatening reporter
description: White House deputy press secretary TJ Ducklo, who threatened a reporter who asked   about his relationship with another reporter, has resigned.

title: 500 vehicles in flames after fuel tanker explodes on  Afghanistan-Iran border
description: More than 500 vehicles burst into flames at the Afghanistan-Iranian border Saturday afternoon after a fuel truck there exploded, provincial officials told Afghanistan's TOLO News.

title: Debate of Beijing's derelict Old Summer Palace is about more than history
description: Northeast of Beijing's resplendent Summer Palace lie the ruins of another stately structure, burned to the ground by European forces during the Second Opium War.

title: NYPD deploys 500 officers to patrol subways after four stabbings in less than 24 hours
description: The New York City Police Department is deploying an additional 500 officers to patrol the city's subway system after four stabbings in less than 24 hours that left two people dead.

title: Nearly a third of US adults are undecided about the vaccine
description: Though officials and health experts say the end of the Covid-19 pandemic will rely on a large proportion of Americans being inoculated, nearly a third of US adults say they have not decided if they will get the vaccine when it is offered to them.
